titles.title: To extend temporarily the duty on 1,3-bis(4-aminophenoxy)benzene (RODA).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/22/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the duty on 1,3-bis(4-aminophenoxy)benzene (RODA).
